title: Builds broken where pre-rendered root route is inside a layout group

milestone.description: stuff we need to nail down before launch

body:
### Describe the bug

The [advanced layouts documentation](https://kit.svelte.dev/docs/advanced-routing#advanced-layouts) says it's possible to put the root route inside a layout group:

> You can also put a +page directly inside a (group), for example if / should be an (app) or a (marketing) page.

However also making the root route pre-rendered appears to break builds (though the dev server still runs fine).

Running `npm run build` fails with the following error:

```
Error: bad base path: ""

    at <anonymous> (<anonymous>)
[vite-plugin-svelte-kit] Prerendering failed with code 1
error during build:
Error: Prerendering failed with code 1

    at EventEmitter.prototype.emit (https://sveltejs-kit-template-default-rsju1n.w-corp.staticblitz.com/blitz.dfae8564d35fe429a0bab219bd7d77341f3ec782.js:6:155574)

    at _0x3ef8b0 (https://sveltejs-kit-template-default-rsju1n.w-corp.staticblitz.com/blitz.dfae8564d35fe429a0bab219bd7d77341f3ec782.js:15:147569)

    at <anonymous> (<anonymous>)
```

### Reproduction

https://stackblitz.com/edit/sveltejs-kit-template-default-rsju1n?file=src/routes/(group)/+page.js

Kill the dev server (or open a second console) and run `npm run build`.
